title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Informal Science Learning Activity Design Based on Facebook

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary Science Fundamental Knowledge and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will search for science-related information on Facebook at least twice weekly and apply it to solve practical problems
Learners will share science education field experiences and materials with peer teachers at least once monthly through Facebook group activities
Learners will achieve an 80%+ assignment submission rate under time constraints through Facebook learning activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
